sys_ux_client_script.name: dropdown_1/items

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_49170aacc3cb6d1011971d4ce00131fb
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="New Deduction default">897f4d20c34b6d1011971d4ce00131bc</macroponent><name>dropdown_1/items</name><preset/><required_translations/><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {TransformApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
function evaluateProperty({ api, helpers }) {
  const { results } = api.data.get_users;
  // console.log ({ results });
  const options = results.map((result) => ({
    id: result.sys_id.value,
    label: result.name.value ,
    sublabel: result.email.value,
    avatarProps: {
      userName: result.name.value,
      imageSrc: result.avatar.value,
      presence: "away",
    },
  }));
  // console.log ({ options });
  return JSON.stringify(options);
}
]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Milton.Jones@employbridge.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-05-23 14:20:52</sys_created_on><sys_id>49170aacc3cb6d1011971d4ce00131fb</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>dropdown_1/items</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Voluntary Deductions" source="x_ebh_voluntary_0">591c37a24729a110265ad698436d431e</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Voluntary Deductions">591c37a24729a110265ad698436d431e</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_49170aacc3cb6d1011971d4ce00131fb</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Milton.Jones@employbridge.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-05-23 14:20:52</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
